stong pa nyid dang/ chen po steng pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus bya stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang
klog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang//
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ das po med pa stong pa di dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/
yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang/ dbang bo lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/
brgyud pa dang/ 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/
rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa dag dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/
gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang ) de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen
rgyu/ bo dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gang ji snyang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag/
kyang gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// bklag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shaki de ni 'du ltar
shrI rigs kyi bu 'am gas kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par 'gyur ti/ de bzhinakAshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe'ang/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang
dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyinang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa/
ba stong pa rjid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid dang/ thog ma dang thum med pa stong ba nyid dang/ ro bamed
ba stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ sa thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po
med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang )dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang ) stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden po
bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas par snyems
par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ ting nga 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin ga shogs
smacha/ pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa ban dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rjechen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
[" ]ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshang red pa dag 'khaslab pa mdzad kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'di lta ste/
'a shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad med pa'i bar du'ang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ de nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi bstan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi bstan pa 'ang 'di yin te/ 'dit+tir
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa laslob slob pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
zhwa la slob slob pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang/ tshul khrims kyis sngog tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang/
nang stong pa nyid slob slob pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ phyinang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ chen po stong pa nyid
la slob slob pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong ba nyid la slob slob pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang dor bamed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/
chos thams cad stong ba nyid la slob slob pa dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob
slob pa dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ yang dag
bar spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams la slob slob pa dang/ dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang/ stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang/ byang chub kyi
yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa la slob slob pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ bsam gtana rnams la
slob slob pa dang/ tshad med pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ rnam par thar ba rnams la slob slob ba dang/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stongang 'di dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la slob
[t ]slob pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob slob pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'a slob slob pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang/ byams pa chen po la slob slob pa dang/
snying rjechen po la slob slob pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'a slob slob pa dang/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang/ lam gyi rnamapa shes pa nyid la
slob slob pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang
phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dung lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin to/ pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur
ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur re/ ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung/ de bzhin gsheg
0pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten bar tu'o/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid
kyan zlos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sopos dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi
rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang la brtenapar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di da nyan thos dang/
rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yanin/ de
dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha 'o tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi snga rol tu phyin pa 'di'i rkyen gyis dang/ rangasangs
rgyas dang/ byungatshub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thamasacad kyirten yin to/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lham yin gyi skyo dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis brjod/
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems
dang 'a sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol
[OT' ]tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par byasU/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dirin thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chubs[︽]sa dpa' sems
mtsho dba' chen bo thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang ma dang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/
sgyu daci'i phyir zhen/ kong shi kasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams tsad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang//
mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste daci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shika nang stong pa nyid 'di ni na thos dang/ rang sa sa
rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thamasacad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang ! lha ma yan gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid
la brten par bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u sha ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo thams cad kyi rten/
0 yin te lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di
ni tan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chenapo thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyidzinuyanano// de
dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya sti/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dung 'u
sems dba' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ ko'u shi ka chen po steng pa 'du 'di ni na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ ma dang/
lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis don dam pa stong pa kid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di na nyan thos dang/
rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus
byas stong pa kyi dul brtan par lus ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di nin thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems
dung cu sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyildan yin te/ lhadang mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dini nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sums dang 'asams dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/
mi dang : lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brten par bya ste/ deci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shika mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/
'dini na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yan gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//

N+NaM de dag gas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brkon par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka thog ma dang bral med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rtenayin te/ lha dang ( mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i khur gyi don yin no// de dgags dor pa med pa stong pa nyid la brten par khu
ste de ci'i phyir zhen/ ke'ushi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa ba chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/
mi dang lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyirten yin no// de dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid labarten par khu ste/ deci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di'i nyan thos dang/ rang sangs
rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin// lha dang mi dang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chos thams cad stong ba nyid
la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ku chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di na )na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// las de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
ko'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di nin thos dang/ rangasangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham
min gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rtan yin no// de dag gisam dmigs pa stongapa )dal brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u kami dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sas rgyas dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dwang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po med
[Ori ]nga stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste ) deci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ku dngos bo med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa drasams dpa' chen po
thams cad kyi rten yin te lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nge bo nyid stong pa 'dra la brten bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi
kA ngo bo nyid stong pa da 'di ni na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin
gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin// de dag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shika dngos po med pa'i ngo bo da stong pa nyid 'di ni
nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi don yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yon no/
de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u kadranang bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems
pa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis yang dag par song ba rnams 'barten par bya ste/
detsi'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka yang dag par sdong ba 'di dag ni na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/
mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rdzu 'phrulakyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos
dngarang sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi sku dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis
dbang po rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shaki dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
rten yinate/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yanigyi skye dgu'ibar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ draci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka stobs 'di dwaganin/
thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yan te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams la brten par byaste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mdang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i 'a ra yan lag brgyad pa/
la brten par bya ste: deci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ! byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ deci'i phyir zhen/
ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bdun pa 'di dag nan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi nyin yin ta lho dang/ ma dang//
lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ku'u ka bsam gtan 'di dag nin thos dang/ rang sangs
rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis tshad med pa rnams la
[54]brten par bya ste)de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka tshad med pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ nangasangs rgyas dang ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
lha dang ma dang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ deci'i phyir zhen/ ke'u na ka gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'a dag ni nyen thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma
yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u zhi karnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thums cad kyirten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yan gyi skya dgu'i bar gyirten yin no// de dag gis mthar kyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya sta/ deci'i phyir zhen/ ke'u shikamathar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag na na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/
byang chub sems dpa'ams dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa de
dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon ba med pa la kharten par bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/
da pa 'di dag ninyan thos dang/ rab ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da' sams dpa' chen po thams cad kyi don yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar
nano// de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ deci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag na skrun thos dang rang sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub
samasu dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yinate/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin gyi sku dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste//
daci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka tang nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ ma dang/
y+Yo lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs
rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po masacanarten yin te/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rangasas rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa'
chen bo thams cad kyi rten yin// lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi 'jig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ chu
kan 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi
skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ daci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang
rangasangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po
la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka snying rjecan po 'di'i rten thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te
lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko shikasangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang khra chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/
lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid 'barten par bya ste/ deci'i phyir zhan/ ko'u shi ka thams cadra shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/
rang sangs rgyus dang/ byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyirten yin to/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yanin// de dag gis lam
gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi kra lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di na na thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yinati/ lha dang/ midang/ lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de la brten par bya ste/ de
ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shika rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag
tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas to/ de la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/ lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba drang/ lha rdzas kyi sngos dang/ lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang/ lha
rdzas kyi phye ma dang/ lha rdzas kyichos gos dang/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang/ lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ lhardzas kyis don dang/ lha rdzas kyisil
sAnamang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas na/ ko'u shika de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyirarigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
rnams mang du 'phel 'am/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi ka de bas kyang
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dras shing 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid
la byed pa dang/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/
phyom dang/ na bza'adang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bstan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rimagyor byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/

kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyadan
sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sams canare'is kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i
mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te ) de dag la bskal pa 'am// bskal ba'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/
lha rdzas kyi 'phrang ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi sngos dang/ lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi phra ma dang/ lhardzas kyi na bza' dang/ lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang/ lhardzas kyi rgyal mtshan
dang lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang/ lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rami gror ngagyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang/ nub byang gi phyogs
mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyadan/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can ri ras kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun 'das bgyis pa ci mchod rten 'apang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyur dpag tshad phyad pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bsal ba 'ag/ bskal
ba'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/ lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang/ lhardzas kyi spos dang/ lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang lha rdzas kyi phyam dang/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang/ lha rdzas
kyi gdugs dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang/ lha smras kyi si'i snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis ! bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/
[z]mchod par bgyis pa dang/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyadan/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshags pa
yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ na po che sna bdun los bgyis pa'imachodartana'aphang du dpag tshadatsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyedapa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la
bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lhardzas kyi me tog dang/ lho rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang/ lha rdzas kyi khug pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi phyi ma dang/ lha rdzas kyin/
bza' dang/ lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ lhardzas kyi ba dan dang/ lha rdzas kyi sal snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis//
phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyadan/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res
kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dasanas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchodarten 'phad du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha
stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lhardzas kyil tog dang/ lhardzas kyi 'phreng ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang/ lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi
klad/ phyam dang/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang/ lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang lhardzas kyi sil snyanasna tshogs/
[I]kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis ra chod par bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ladziltar dgongs/ de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/
de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi ka mang ngo/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas
kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ chub par bgyid cing/ de 'am tog dang/
'phreng ba dang/ spos dang ( byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur
ster bgyis/ bu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel la/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i
chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi las rnams dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshadamed pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhidang/
bka7 sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi bar lo tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i parol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chan po steng pa nyid dang/
don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa rnyed dang/
der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ das
bomed pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams dang/ yang dag par sbyong b rnams
dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang ! 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanamamed pa dang/ smon pa med pa gsum dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal dang [） ]kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/
lam bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyud dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams
cudang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhinagashegs ba'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa khazhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang//
'chi snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ thams cad nganus pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
'dus so// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rel tu phyin par gyur to// phyin te// spyan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs
kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing
kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la khyedacing/ gong dum tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ sbyos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bzu' dang/ gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mtshod bar khyas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi khu'o
de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ dbag tu mid par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa las byung ba ni/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni
bsam gtan gyi pha rol phyin pa'o// gshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rel
tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nang stong ba nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba na phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa
nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ban chen bo stong pa nyid do// shes rab/
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byub ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung banu'i dus
ma byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong
ba nyidi do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
glu byung ba na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dngos po med po stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi phal tu phyin pa las byung bani bo nyid stong
pa nyid do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams //

[za/ ]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni yang dag pa stong pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byang bani rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
pa las byung ba ni dbang bo rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ban byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasaso//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams so// shes rab kyi
parol tu phyin pa las byung pa ni bsam gtan rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni gzung/ sa
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a sa byung ba ni rnam par thar pa rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mgrwar gyi gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o// shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung banamangon par shes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rolog tu phyin pa 'a sa byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba
[Pr ]/ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams go shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
[1 ]byung ba nimi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasubyung ba ni byams pa chen
pho'o shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyin lnga'o )shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung banisams can yongs su smin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o//
ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi
k+Sha pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ko'u shaka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bani1na thos kyi theg pa'o// shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni theg pa chen po'o/ ko'u shikishes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa las byung bani bla nAmadapa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bu chub bo// ko ki ka de bas na rigs kyi dedu lam/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ glegs bam du
byas shing 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing/ me tog dang/ 'phung ba dang/ spos dang byug kha
dang phye ma dang/ na bza'adang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ kur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/
mchod par byas n/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba sngams brgya'i char yang b.ram grogo stong gi cha dang brgya phrag stong gi cha dang/
bye ba'i cha dang bya ba brgya'i cha dang/ bye ba stong gi cha dang/ bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang/ grangs nga/ cha dang 3 bgrang ba dang/ dpar yang tabar mi 'gro'o// rgyur
yang nye bar mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas kyi dkon mchog nub bar
'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog nub bar mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
bsam gtan bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhinams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
ba bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon pa gshes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyini 'jig rten du 'byungabar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ra'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten/
du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong ba
khyod 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuralo phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyinang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuralo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyidi 'jig
rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ chen po stong ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig
rten du 'byung bar 'gyura'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'ag rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha
ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// der ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos/
thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa da 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jigarten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig
rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur la// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan
rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// man par shes pa rnams 'jigarten du byung bar 'gyur ro ting nge
'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// de srid du rgya rigs che zhing
mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur re bram za'irigs che zhing mkhre b rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyisaM bdag gi rigis che zhing mtho bams 'jig rten
du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshema'i lha/
rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurare// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurare// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha taphan gyi lha rnachos 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'ag rten du 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten/
du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dag pa'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung par 'gyur re// chu dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ chab 'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur re/ chung tsho'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur go 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi tsheba'i
lhan nas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// shin tu mthob lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyanem
snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rtenadu'abyung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do// chos kyi'akhor/
lo bskor ba yod do/ sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod de// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams 'din/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/ mtshoma'i lha rnams dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang/ 'phrul/
dga'i lha rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs lha te phan gyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang/
tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang/ snang ba'i lha rnams dang/ chung snang gi lha rnams dang/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang/ dgu ba'i lha/
rnams dang/ chung dga'i lha rnams dang/ tshad med dag pa'i lhan ms dang/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang/ che ba'i lha rnams dang chu che'i lha rnams dang/ tshad med tsho ba'i lha rnams dang/ 'bras
bu cheba'i lha rnams dang/ mi tshe ba'i lha rnams dang/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang/ 'og min gyi lha
gang ji snyed yodapa de dag la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
bcang bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang/ bcas ba dang/ bklags pa dang/ kun chub par byas pa dang/
wa @#// tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas nis sa rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi
[I ]'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag chos kyi tshulargyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyura'o// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyinang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyura'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 'dusam byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur mtha'alas 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// der ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurago/ rang bzhin stong
pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurare// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag
par slong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuralo//
stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung
bar 'gyur re// 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur re// bsam gtanaM rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rtenaM
@#/ du 'byung bar 'gyur// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung/
bar 'gyur ro// mthachos gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang
tha smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngonapar shes ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba rnams
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bris bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs panams sa ba rnams /
[c/]rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhagi/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
ko'u ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ deci'i phyir zhon/ ko'u shikanam lham yuna rnams 'di snyam du sems shing/ sum
cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang 'thab mo bya'o/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang mtshams brdal lo snyam na de'itshe/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis
soms la kha ton gyis zhig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang/ des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de dag slos shing rnam par
'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na'ang ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a mos pas lha'i
a/ @#// gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u ka shes rab kyi pha ro'otu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi khu/
[n ]'am gis kyi bumo ma/ gangasu'ang rung ste/ bang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dag ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis ban
ga med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas phung po ma
lus pa'i rgya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tuman
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos spyodage 'dun
dang bcas pa ji skad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// deci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam (rangasas rgyas kyi chos
sam byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan
'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dini rig sngags chenamogo/ cel ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dini bla na med pa'irig sngags so//
bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni'i mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngagasago/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das den 'di ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nimi dag ba'i chos thams cad stong ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalab/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// ded
bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen po/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig
sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shika
[n ]da ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag khacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ banamed pa
tsha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag/
kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brtan// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
na de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ blo na med pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi kade ni 'di ltar rig sngags 'ad yid n/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig

'jig rten yod pa yin/ bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rtenan yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i deb nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rtenan yod pa yin/ dran pa/

nan gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rtenan gdags su yod payin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rtenan gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rtenAn gdags su yod pa yin/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ bar na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yodan rtsi dang/ rgyaskur dang/ skar ma thamA
cad gdags su yod do/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na dgaba'i spyod pa dang/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi'am dang//
bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/
stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ mthadzAgyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/
ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ stobs bcu dang ma 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyichos ma 'dres kha'i rtsi thams cad
gdags su yod do// slob pa dang/ mi slob pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rangasangs rgyas kyirgyu skar dang/ skur ma thams cad kyang gdugs su yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rtenanayod khar 'gyur ro// gang gi tsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshana'ang/
