zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po tha bas mkhas pa gang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
[】 ]dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ nang stong pa
nyid la spyod pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ stong pa nyid stongang nyid la spyod pa dang/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/
wA don dam pa stong ba nyid la spyod pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/
thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong po nyid la spyod pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ chos thams cad stong panyidel spyod
[d)] pa dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
sbyod ba dang/ das po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang ba rnams la spyod pa dang/ dbang bo rnams laspyod pa dang/ stobs rnams la spyod pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod ba dang 'phags po'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang ) 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams la sbyod pa dang/ tshod med pa rnams la spyod pa dang/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang/
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la
spyod pa dang/ gzus kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ so so yang dag par
@#// rig pa rnams la skyod pa dang/ snying rje chen bo la spyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang/ nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang/
rang sas rgyas kyi sa mngon du ma byed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ tshaphun sum tshogs po yongs/
su 'dzin pa dang/ sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ byang chub sems dba' phun sum tshogs
pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o//
ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'da'adzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul
bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang/ tsha bas gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
bu 'amaM )rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyidapa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa/
de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal tra/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'an
pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid byed pa de sngon gyi las kyirnam par smin pamagatogs par/ dug gis dus byed par
mi 'gyur ro// mtshon gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mas dus khyad par mi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas/ nad brgya rtsa gcig bar gyis dus khyad par mi 'gyur
ro rgyal po dang bla nas gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du
songan de la grags 'tsho ba de dag gis glags mi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang/ rgyalapo'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtan dri ba dang/ gdam bya bar sems shing dga' bar
bya bar sems go/ deci'i phyir zhen/ de nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang mthus de ltar sems so// gal te rigs kyibu 'ag/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du son/ de la rgyal bo'i bu'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dring dang/ gtam
bya bar sems shing dga' bas sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'de ltar rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems
[OTi]can thams cad la khams pa'i sems nye bar gzhig/ snying rje'i sems dang/ dga' ba'i sems dang/ btang snyoms kyi sems dbar ga zhag pa'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni
tsha'adi'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ko'u shika tsher bas gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te// bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/
zla dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag nga ra stong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang bo rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnam
dang lam rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/
[d]/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang/ many+dzar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/
mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ soso
yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs bar
nam yang sems can dmyal bar mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o// denam yang yan lag nyams pa can du mi 'gyur ro// nam yang
dbul po'i rigs su mi skye'o// smyug ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ sme sha can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag bdar ba 'am/ shan pa 'amo phag gsod pa'i rigs/
sam/ dmangs rigs su mi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ) 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ sangs rgyas bcos/
ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang 'brel bar mi
'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ sangs/
rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byas te/
da dgan nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di'i yon tan dang/ tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur
ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu'o// de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang/ kun tu rgyu ba glags lta ba'i bsam pa can
brgya tsam zhig/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su deng ba dang de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang/ kun tu rgyu ba bcu/
ba bo glags lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songan/ de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas/ mu stegs can gzhan/
dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong nas bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las jisod bzung ba de dag
kha ton du brjod do// de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang/ kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 'am da nyid dang/
sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang/ kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring
po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te lam de nyid dang/ sgo de nyidanas phyir don datsi'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ tshadang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po/
brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang/ kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgya daring po ring po//
[' ]nas nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang/ sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rtsub 'di dag 'dus
'ga' tsam la'ang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pas mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang/ kun turgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa glags lta'i
bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir 'ong bar sanas pa sha stag kyang/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa// bdud du bcas pa/ tshangs par bcas pa dang/
dge sbyong dang bram bur bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/ glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro bar/
ma mthong ste/ deni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang/
sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ mtsham dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs lha to na dang/ tshangs pa
kun 'khor dang/ tshangs chen dang/ snang ba dang/ chung snang dang/ tshad med snang ba dang/ kun snang dang ba dang/ dge ba dang ( chung dag dang/ tshad med dag pa dang//
dag rgyas dang/ che ba dang/ chung che dang/ tshad med che ba dang/ 'bras bu tshab dang/ mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ shin tu mthong pa dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/
'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyad cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ su ra da ti'i bu gzhan
yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa jisnyad cig bzhugs pa dang/
rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ diltar de dag
[a/ ]@#// thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lha dang/ ku dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ dri bra dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po gang nyid cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyil
rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni'ishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dag 'dun dang bcas pa drisnyed cig bzhugs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub
[@ ]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drib dang/ lha ma yin dang/ namamakha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang/
lto 'phye chen po gang jinyid cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang/
bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/
lha ma yin dang/ namamakha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen kho gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo//
datsi'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi khyi ma
snyad dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dag 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyad cig bzhugs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ sanod sbyin dang/ dri bra dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi yarol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ shar
lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi khyem snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas btsam ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig/
bzhugs pa dang/ rangs sa rgyas dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po gang jisnyad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung go/ de ci'i phyir
zla chen 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ lhanub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi khyim snyad dag na//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang/ rangasangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dparasems dpa' chen po dang/ lha
dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad/
kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ nub byang ga
phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byam snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas brdzisnyed cig bzhugs pa dang/ rang sas
rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri ba dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi ldan
ci dang lte 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga byem snyed dgan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang// gnod sbyin dang/ drib dang/
lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung
ngo/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
u#// dgan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dag 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems/
dan sangs rgyasalangs ldan la
ka dba' sems dpa' chen po dang/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po gang
ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// deci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur/ 'dod pa la spyod pa dang/ gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las/ 'dir ni gdon mi za bar byang chub/
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/ de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song stobs/
lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'grel
'dedal/ bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa saanas par bkod pa 'di ni/ rgyal po ma 'a'i sa ra'i dpung gi tshogs par lag bzhi la rnam par bkod bas
kyang de tsam ma phod/ rgyal po sde rab 'bar ma byed dang/ shAkya rnams dang/ yid tsha ba rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas dang de tsam mi bod do//
bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la'ang glags lta zhing grags tshe// sems can yang dag par brten pa rnams la'ang gtso ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/
bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o// dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di yang dag par bsam te/ dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar
bdud sdig to can de dag lam de nyid dang/ sgo de nyid nas phyir 'ag go/// de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang ) 'og min gyi lha'akhor du ji gnang
bka@#// cig 'khod pa de dag gis rdzas kyi me tog dang/ na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas bar snang ginam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du brtem ldan 'das ga
na ba der gter to/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas tshiga'adi skad du brjod do/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
yun ring por spyod par gyur cig 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing ) dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o// 'dzam
bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi b.ragyi de bzhir kashogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam nga 'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing/ dge 'dun
dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags po'ang yod par 'gyur zha/
ba phyogs gangan rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi b.rel tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o//
phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin dang/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i
bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos
kyang yun ring du gnas shing/ dge 'dun dkonamchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurar// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ phyogs bcu kun gyi
'jig rten gyi khams kyibar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring duganas
shing dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'ang yod par 'gyur
@#// ro phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu ban/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni
[n ]snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so// phyogs de namagon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon
par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba deramangon par gtor te/ 'di skad kyi tshig brjod de// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'an/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid cing/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam/ bdud kyi rigs su gtog/
pa'i lha klags tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'tsha/ rigs kyi bumo de 'a rtag tu rgyun tsho 'chad par bsrung ba dang/
bskyab pa dang/ bskyang bar bgyi'o/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ gsakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tsang 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub
par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni ston pa bas/ ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so// de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu na ) rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu khyen pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing/
kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du bde 'a bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dga' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te// bcom ldan 'das dgas kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon kyi rgya la 'a snga 'gyi 'bagyis par 'gyur
ro bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/
tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bstan bkur bgyis pa ra 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi ba
ra'o tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshu'i bzhin du yid la brgyad pa de dag ni dge ba'i ba shes ga na gyis yongs su gzung bar
'gyurar// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
kun// 'di lta ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shesarab kyi pha la tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o// deci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
[n ]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la ( rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid kyang gzhanam lags/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/
gzhan a lags te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ de de bzhinate ko'u shi ka shes ba ba kyi ba rel tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen padolas byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pago/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di
ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhanam yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltarashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u lte ku gcig ge// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bsen ldan 'das/
kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa mamadzad/ de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rel
tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ba bod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rel tu phyin pa'i ming yang
yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa mamadzad )de ltar phyi nang
stongang nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod/
pa ma mdzad/ de ltar don dam pa stong ba nyid kyi ming yang songs su brjodapa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus byas stong pid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad ) de ltar 'dus ma
@#// bus stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar thog ma dang/
tham med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyidakyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ming
yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pas mdzad/ de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa
pa na [<]da/ de ltar mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa na mdzad/ de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid kyi mang yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa yid kyi ming 5yongs su kharjod pa ma mdzad de// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab
kyi snga rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ dran pa dbar gzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ming yang
khongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dbang bo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod par mdzad/ de ltar stobs
rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ming/
yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod
ba ma mdzad// de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi'ang yang yongs su brjod pa mamadzad/ de ltar tshad med nga rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod nga mamadzad/ de ltar gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad de// ji ltarangashes rab kyi nga rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ rnam par thar pa/
brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa mamadzad/ de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'imang yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad ) de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa 'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar
ting nge 'dzin rnams kyiming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad ) de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa mamadzad do// ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming
yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ dbazhinagashegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma nad/ de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming dang yong
su brjod pa ma mdzad de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar snying rje chen po'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi
dang tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin
ga shags pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o// kun tu 'dren pa'o/
dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nin lags so/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsdus pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyiwa'ol tu phyin pa yin nas/ gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'das de ni na lugs so// banom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa 'ib brod pa bzod pa'i/
ba lo'i tu phyin pa yinanam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga/ de drisnyam du soms/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang dad
yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nan/ gsol nga/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
de ngesnyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos nga 'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi tshad la tu phyin pa yin nam// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni
ma 'a gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams ca dmakhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa 'ang shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu
ni/@#// phyin pa yin nag/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngog
pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdus pa'i sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pani sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yonano// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni ]
tshul khrims kyi pha de'o tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa tre tshul khrims ni tshul khrims kyi/
pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bgrod pa na bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i
tshul dang/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i 'bod pa ni brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa tshod du yongs su bsdos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bskos pa'i brtson 'grus ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thums dudamakhyen pa nyid du yongs su ba sdos
pa'i bsam gtan ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de bsam
gtanani bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdus pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yin no// gsolang/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma na ches nga 'i tshul dang/ jaltar ma skye ba'i tshul dang/ mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa 'gas/ riltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang/ ji ltar skye ba'i tshul dang/ mi
la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngon nga 'tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi phale' du phyin pa lags/ ji ltang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang//
jiltaran skya ba'i tshul dang/ mi dmigs pa 'i tshul kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad du yongs su bsdos nga 'i bzod pa brjod pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis sum mchis
nga'i tshul dang/ ji ltarami skye ba'i tshul dang/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/
ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang ji ltar mi skye ba'itshul dang/ mi dmigs nga 'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'ibasam gtan bsam gdon
gyi par lo'al tu phyin pa 'a gas ji ltaraganyis su ma ra sa pa'i tshul dang/ ji ltaras skye ba'i tshul dang/ mi dar gas pa'i tshul gyis dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rnyed du yongs su bsngos
pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tulubyen pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang tsher ba gnyis su re da nga 'i
tshul dang/ 'du shes gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ 'du byed gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ mig gnyis su med pa'i tshul/
dang : rnab gnyis su re da pa'i tshul dang/ sna gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ lce gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ lus gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ yid gnyis su med
pa'i tshul dang/ gzugs gnyis su med nga 'i tshul dang/ sgra gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ driganyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ riganyis su med pa'i tshul dang reg gis/
med pa'i tshul dang/ tshes gsasu re da pa'i tshul dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/
sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su re da pa'i tshul dang/ lcawI rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ yid kyi
rnam par shes pa gnyis sumed pa'i tshul dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/
[YI ]sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa 'i tshul dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ yid kyi 'dus te
ga reg da gnyis su mdang khri tshul dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher nga gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/
sna'i 'dus da reg nga 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su mdapa'i tshul dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su mad pa 'i tshu dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa 'i tshul dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshu' dang/ sa'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ 'i khams
sh+tsa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ me'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ rlung gi khams gnyis su med pa'i tshuladang/ nam mkha'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/
rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ marig pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ 'du khyod gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ rnam par shes paganyis su
med pa'i tshu dang ming dang gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ sku ra ched drug gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ reg paganyis su med nga 'i pa dang/ tshor ba gnyis su med//
pa'i tshul dang/ srid pa gnyis su med pa'i tshu dang/ ler nga gnyis sumed nga 'i tshul dang/ srid pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ skye ba gsumed pa'i tshul dang//
rga shiganyis su med pa 'i tshul dang sbyin 'khri ba gol tu nga na nga gnyis su me da nga 'i tshu dang/ tshul khrims kyi pad rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshu' dang/ brtson 'grus kyi le'al du phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshun dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ shes
rab kyipa rel tu na pa gnyis su med pa 'i tshul dang/ nang stong pa 'di gnyis su re da pa'i tshul dang/ phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su
med pa'i tshul dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyida'/nyisasu med pa'i tshul dang/ chen po stong pa nyid gnyis sumed pa'i tshul dang/ den dam pa stong pa nyid ga sa su med pa'i tshul dang
'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang 3 mtha' las 'das pa stong pa Tid gnyis su med pa 'i tshul dang/
