rtags pa mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'dasan pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma na chis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis// rtags ma
mchis brjod dum mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das pa stong pa nyed ni smos su mamachis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma
mches brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis//
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa sta/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po steng pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis//
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid de smos su ma mchis nga 'o// bcom ldan 'adas 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis//
rtags man chis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong 'dan smos su ma mchisang 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rim tshan ma ma/
mchis rtags mamaches/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dus gu bus stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma thaga' sa 'das pa stong pa
nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa sa ya pa'idani smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma mdapa stong pa de da ni smos su ma mchis
nga lo bcom ldan 'das der ba med pa stong pa nyidani mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du mamachis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das der bamad pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma
ka@#/ mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin/
[1 ]stong pa kid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du mamachis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos
thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa bo/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stongar 3 ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis// brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba lte da ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa sta/ bcom ldan
'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyidani mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchas/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidani smos su mamachis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos pomed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
d+ha/ pa ste bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i nge bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa lta bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchig/ rtags ma mchis//
brjod du mamachis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams ni smos su ma na chis pa'o/ dbcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ra tshan ma ma mchis/ tshugs
ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'i// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchas/
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpang po rnams na mtshan ma na mchis/
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams na smos su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis
brjod du sa na chis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan )ga rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtogs ma mchis/
brjod du mchachosar ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa na mtshan ma ma mchis//
ga @#// rtags mamachis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'apags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags/
pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis ) rtags ma mchis/ brjod dun mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshad/
med pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni smos sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par rnams na mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni
cha smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams na mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnamA
ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mthadzagyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis// brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med/
pani mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
na smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis// brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par
shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshanam ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis// brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
'das gzungs kyi sgo rnamasan smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shags pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags
ma @#/ ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
[On ]ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags mamachis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnamasani smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan
ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das snying rjechen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
rnams ni mtshan mam mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// nga rtsom/
ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyidan smos su ma mchis pa 'o/
bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshanam ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni smos
su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchas/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'dasarnam pa
ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal teshes rab kyi pha re'agatu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshanam ma mchis pa ma lags na ni//
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang/ rtagasam mchis pa dang// brjod du ma mchis pa dang/
smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bams can rnams la mtsham la chas pa dang/ rtags ma mchis pa
dang brjod du ma mchis pa dang/ smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis//
brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshanam mamachis pa dang rtogs ma tsha/chis pa dang/ brjod du ma mchis pa dang/
smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ blun che da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang rtogs
ma mchis pa dang/ brjod du ma mchis pa dang/ smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan te/// bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'din lha dang mi dang/
lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang ) rgyal
[T ]mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan tshogs kyis rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ dud dang/ mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// khris shing me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/
spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/
phu dud dang mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub pa dang/ tshul bzhin
du yid la bgyid pa dang/ de bris shing me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang ) sos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ nabasngal dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/
sol snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par baphyid na/ de ni ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can ngagal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyirgyud kyi rigs pa ma mchis par bgyig
nyan thos kyi sa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dgas pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// da ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang na 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang
yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang )byug pa dang/ phyem
dang na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sa'i snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa brgyud cing/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsalan/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab la
tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di las byung ba ni di bzhin gsashegs pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de
bzhani gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ma gleng bgyi ba dang/ bkur stir bgyi ba dang ) phu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyikha lags// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu me de dag
rgyu// gis de dag la yi ger bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phudud du bgyis ) mchod par bgyis na/ log par ltung ba dang/ ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/
lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa skyong nas smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg kha 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su
mngan las 'da' bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de lta bsan gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni ma 'dra ba ma mchis so//
de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
!/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang//
dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ tshags su bcad pa dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ gleng gzhi dang/ 'di ltar 'das pa dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/
shin tu rgyas pa dang/ chos rmad du byung ba dang/ rtogs pa brjodapa dang/ chos gtan yakhab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang/ rigs bu 'am/ rigs kyi khu bo la las/
[s-]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang sa 'drab ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di las byung
ban de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa rgyus rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni tshe 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung bani mdo dang/ dbyangs kyis
bsad pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang [7 ]tshags su bcad pa dang/ chad du brjod pa dang/ gleng gzhi dang/ 'di ltar 'das pa dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/ shin tu rgyas pa
dang chos rmad du byung pa dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ chos gtan 'bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang nub phyogs kyadi bzhin gshegs pa/
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang phyogs kyi de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
kyidi bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa rgyus
ba @#// dang lhanub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin ga shag
[Or ]pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ 'og phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi dbazhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi khyu ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsad pa dang/
lung bstan pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ gleng gzhi dang/ 'di ltar 'dus pa dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/ shin tu rgyas pa dang/ ches rmad du
byung ba dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ chos gtan la bab pa bstan cing gsungs te bshad pa dang/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung
'ang kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'dilas byung bani 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyang sakyis bsnyad pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang/
tshigs su bcad pa dang/ ched dubarjod pa dang/ gleng gzhi dang/ 'di ltar 'das pa dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/ shin tu rgyas pa dang/ tshes rmad du byung ba dang/ rtogs pa brjod/
ba dang chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs/
ba dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus de dag la me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod par bgyis pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris
shang me tog dang/ 'phrengab dang/ spos dang byugapa dang/ phyag dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis
rig gro dang/ bkur sti dpa phu dud dang mchod par bgyis pa'ang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/
klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa des ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par
bgyi' byol songagi skyeganas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyisa'i dgas pa ma mchis par
bgyi'o de ci'i slad du zhen: 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab
kyi nga rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shange 'dzanito// 'chang ngo// klogago/ kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la'ang ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/
spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dngang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang sa'i snyan snatshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur staribagyid/
pu rud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu sel/
bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyikhu 'am/ rigs kyilu mo gangang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/
ba kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ de la me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ sos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/
sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod par bgyid pa des na gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas/ rgyal po la gnas shing/ rgyal po la rtenan/ de rgyal po la gnas shAng/ rgyal po rten pas/ sus 'jigs pa
da dganyid kyang de la rten pas de dag gis 'jigs par ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rtenang bo/
khacom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
ba'i ye shes gang lags pa de'angashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa de
kid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di las khyung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyisiso
'di las byung pa bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag
par rig ba bzhi'o// 'di las khyung bani sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni khyams pa chen bo dang snying chen po'ago/ khacom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol/
tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo// 'di las byung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngan//
grong rdal las/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang
klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ de bris shing rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa bgyid pa de dag tum 'am mi ma lags pa glags lta 'ang glags tshol ba rnams
kyis glags rAd par mi 'gyur te/ sams can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du bgyur ro// !
bcom ldan 'das de lta bsan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
ba57 don du nye bar gnas so/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas khyung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o// btsem/
ldan 'das 'di lta ste dbar nanor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan// nor bu rin po
chachen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der/ mi ma rags pa rnams kyis glags me nad de// mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyang nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan
na mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po cha chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzed de/ myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so// mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na mkhris pa
de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na rlung de dang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu 'bon chen
bo nga btags na bad kan de'ang 'khor 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i bris btab pa'i lus la nad ku'an po che chen po da btags na/ 'dus pa'i khe dbang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam pa mi 'phel
sgo nub mo ni snang bar bgyidade// tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid de// grang ba'i dus nani nor bur rin po che chen po de/
phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de drab r bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dag sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de'ang ha cang ya ma tre/ hacang yang//
[T ]mi grang nyang ran pa phun sum tshogs bar bgyid do/ nor bu rin po che chen po de dag sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i rig sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam/ dem lags pa'i sdig pa la sogs pa
gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin ba la de nor bu rin po che chen po de bstanan/ des de
mthengam thag tu dug de'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu'an po che chen po dan yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te skyes pa ma bud med la la zhig 'brug
bus bta' kham/ mgarab rib can du gyur te/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dang/ lca'anyid dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba
las de'i lus la nor bu rin po checan po de btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib bas/ mge gi nad dam/ rnaba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/lce'i nad dam/
lkog ma'i nad dam/lus kyind de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che
babs chen po de chab rog pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gis
sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsalanachab de'ang de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang
bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dmar pos dkris te chab kyind du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che/
chen po de gos dkar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsalan chab de'ang de rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos le brgan gyis rakris te chab kyi nang du sul
chab de 'ang po'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyuraro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te chab kyi nang du lcal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro//
de dag dang gas gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rer bu rin po chachen po de dkris te chab kyinang du stsalan chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// chab de la snyog kha mchas pa'ang nang du
rin po che chen po des 'dang/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de na yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang/ gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu ni po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa lta/ sdig pa thams cad sel
[rt ]bco denas tshadang ldan po dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ ko'u shi ka de dzisnyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig
yin nam/ 'on tamanog bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la'ang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa dga' bonor bu rin po che chen bo de ni lha rdzas te//
btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu yin po tshegang yod pa de dag ni chung zhang : lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma
rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag na lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po
che'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpa 'am/ cur nyakharagi 'grogo/ denas yang lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis/ bcos ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
bcom ldan 'dasanor bu rin po che chen bo de snod la la zhig nang du stsal stsal ba las/ snod de nas byung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yi de dumachi bar 'gyur te//
bas gzhan yang snod de la mos pa skyed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam/
sems kyi sdug bsngal dang/ gnod pa che las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po
zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'a ya shesakyi tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ni yon tan lta ji snyad cig brjod par bgyista/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cigabarjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan gyi la rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan tshad ma mchis
so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang basam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyid cig brjod
par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi ba re' tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod de// btsem/
ldan 'das bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cigakharjodabar bgyi lta ) bzod pa'i khare tu phyin pa'i yon tani tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bazod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod de/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyipha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tanani tshad ma mchis so// dobazhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dgakyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
ba'i yon tan ltaji snyed cigal brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tanan tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dgakyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa snod do// bcom ldan 'dasanang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung de dag kyang nang stong ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyidakyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dgakyad kyi stong pa nyid kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyidakyi yon tan lta ji snyad cig brjod bar bgyi ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi

bawan+ti yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyisnod de/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
bgyi sta stodapa ti stong ba nyid kyi yon tanani tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa
nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag sgrung chen po steng pa nyid kyi snod do/
bcom ldan 'das den dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lto snyad tsami kharjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tanan tshod ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig bsdu bar bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tanan tshad ma mchis so/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong ba nyidakyi yon tan lta jisnyad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma
byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshadam mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das//
ba can// stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/
gdung de dag kyang 'thagalas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyad cig brjod par bgyi ste theg ma dang tha ma
med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das der ba mad
pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgya sta/ dor ba med pa stong ba nyidakyayon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dor ba/
med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod de/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yin tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
de bzhin ga[︽]shegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lha nga snyid cig brjod par ba ste//
chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tanan tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang//
rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyidikyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan nitshad
ma mchis so// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'dus dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjed
par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidakyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo la stong pa nyidakyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di
stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar
[4 ]@#// gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjed par bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ngesnyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par sbyong ba rnams kyi
yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'asku gdung de dag kyang yang dag par stong ba rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji
sud cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin ga shags pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod de/
bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lta ji sud cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan na tshad ma mchisaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams
kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das stobs lda'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshadam mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stobs
rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tanani tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dgakyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyid cig brjod par bgyi ste/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ de pazhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das
'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams kyi yon tan lha risnyadatsag brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bdenapa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skugadung de dag
kyang 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtanabazhi'i yon tan lta ji snyad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang khasam gtan rnams kyi snod do/ bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad med pa rnams kyi
yon tanani tshad ma mchis so// de bzhinagashegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad med pa rnamasakyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lta
ji snyed cigabarjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan nitshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gazugs med pa'i snyoms
[F ]@#// par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yin/
tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ra thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i
yon tan lta ji snyad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
ma thar gyis gnas nga 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i yon tan lta
ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshadam mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod de//
bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyad cigabarjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tid de 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan
chas ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par/
bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung de dag kyang de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji
snyad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
snod de/ bcom ldan 'das snying chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyid cig brjod par bgyi lta/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi/
[}] chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tanan tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 3das thams
cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams
cad shes pa nyid kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchig
sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyin pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta jisnyad cig brjod par bgyi
sta rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin nyid kyi snod
dngo bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyad cigakharjod bar bgyi ste/ gzhanam yan pa de bzhin nyid
kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzhanam yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
brjod par bgyi ste/ chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta
ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tanani tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ches kyidabyings kyi snodado// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod
de bcom ldan 'das chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tanani tshad ma mtshes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
@#/ gdung de dag kyang ches mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mkhra'i yon tan lta nga sud cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag parten ku'i
yon tan ni tshad ma mnges so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'am tha'i snod do// btsem ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed/
cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyis kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam kyis mi khyab pa 'dabyings kyi snodo/
dngo/ bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyimatshams sbyor ba'i nyon
mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshesas pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad sngas
cha pa'i snod de// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu btang snyoms laganas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
so de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
bgyi ste mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhinagashegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi stod do// de bas na de bzhin gsheg/
pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'an po che'i snod de// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i
snad do de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag
pa'i snod de// de bas na de bzhinagashegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mapa' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni la rel tu phyin pa rlung pa ma mchis
pa dang dar ba ma mchis pa'i snod do/ debs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni nga rol tu
phyin pa dpra ba da nga bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni'atshed pa mnga' go/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
dadag na ba yol tu khyen pa 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ gnas ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i ches nyid kyi snod de// de bsan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// gzhan yang
rdo gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byar khur yongs su gtams pa lta zhog ki/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byed snyad cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag gis khyur bur gtams pa dang/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsalan/
bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdagani shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mched pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskos pas na/ de bzhin ga/ shegs/
[/]ba'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang/ bkur
ster bgyid pa dang/ phu dud du bgyadapa dang/ mchod par bgyid pa 'od dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing
mtheb 'am/ khyim bdag gi rogs che zhing mtho ba ma/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gyi lha lam mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul
dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang/ bklags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul
bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur re// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod nga 'i pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ra ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur re dang stong
gnyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyinang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong
[OT] pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha
ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa 2bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs ra ra 'gyur ro// dbang bo lnga songs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga pa ngas su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
ro 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bdad pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa ra 'gyur ro: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro// tshad mdar bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur re// gzugs me dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro// ma thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu longs u rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yongs
su rdzogs pa ra 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de chedadu bsams te lus
u yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing/
[，1]ra tho ba can/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyigazugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ par/
bas nge 'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyanathos kyis dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das te/ byang chub sems/
dang ri skyon mad par 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
mngon par shes pa theb nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdagani de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la ma gro ma mchin
'dam lags/ glu bam ches pa'ang ma lags/ ma chod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/ gzung bar ma 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
yin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang
lags phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la 'ang rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mched par//
bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma na ches la gan de bzhin go ) shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang/ chos ston pa de dag ches kyi sku dang/ gzugs kyi sku dang/ ye shes kyi skuramathong bar 'tshal zhing ma chod
par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar ngagyi/ bkrug par bgyi/ kun chub pa ra bgyi/ mchod par bkyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par
bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi khu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad mamachis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa nying dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigasakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ tshes
nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi khu 'ar/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi//
mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag na tshes nyid de//
gnyes gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid de// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi ches rnams kyi
chos kid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ stong pa nyidi stong pa byed kyi ye shes dang//
chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ 'dus bus stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ye shes dang/ pagra las
'das pa steng pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/
tshes thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi steng zhes dang/ dnges pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ dran pa ru bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ya shes dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i/
ye shes dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang/ dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang 3 stobs lnga'i ya zhes dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang/ 'apags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang/ bsam gtan bzhi ye shes dang/ tshad med pa bzhi'u ya shes dang/ gzugs med
ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang/ rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang 3 smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i ya shes dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yang shas dang gzungs
kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang/ so so yatshadag par rigapa bzhi'i ya zhes dang/
snying rje chen po'i yo shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang/ dag pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang/ mi dge kha'i ches rnams kyi ye shes dang
ka'@#// zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang/ brag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang/ 'jig rten gyi ches rnams kyi ye shes dang/ 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid
gang lags she na/ da ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang/ gnas pa ma mchis pa dang/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang/ kun
nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang/ 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang/ 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do//
chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u shAkade de bzhinano// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed
cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dinyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas so// ma 'os pa'i dus kyi de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten cing/ bla na med pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dgan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsamapa dang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus gang jisud cig bzhugs ngashang 'tsho skyong ba dang/ chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i khang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang/
drisnyad cig byung ba dang/ ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang jisnyad cig 'byung ba dang/ da ltar byung ba'i
de bzhin gshegs pa dgrakhacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyedacigayod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba 'di nyid la brten te/
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur re// lanacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyura'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
khu thob bo// 'thob go/ theb par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gangaji/
snyed cig byung ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rangs sa rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang/ da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med gras med ba dag na/ rang sangs rgyas
sgra gang jisnyad cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dgagis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// kheb par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen//
ba 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang/ dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang/ skye
bamed pa'i tshul dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang/ rnam bar khyung ba med pa'i tshul dang/ man par 'du bya ba med
ba'i tshul dang/ len pa med pa'i tshul dang/ der ba med pa'i tshul dang/ dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang/ bstan pa med pa'i tshul dang/ blang ba med pa'i tshul dang/
spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
na ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pani tshu la ma yin/ pha ngel mayin/ thad du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug kha ma yin/
mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yani/ 'dus byas ma yin/
'dus ma byas ma yin ) dag ba ma yin/ mi dge pacha yin/ 'das pa la yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da lta khyung ba ma yin te: ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shaka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bani rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shika shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pani lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ichos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u zhi ka
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
so so'i skye bo'i ches rnams 'dor ba ma yin no/// shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa kham po brgya nyi shu bdun pa//
brgya byin gyis gsol kha/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po sku/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
ka dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dil spyod pa rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ soms can dudamigs pa mkhachas so// sems can
du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis/
sma go gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ shed can du dmigs pa kha mchis so// shed bdag tu dmigs pa/
ma mchis so// byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchisaso// shes pa por dmigs ba ma mchis so// mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so//
gzugs su dmags pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmigs/
pa ma mchis so// mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna bar dmigs pa mams so// snar dmigs ba ma mchis so// lcer dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus su dmigs pa
sa mchis so// yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// sgrar dmigs pa ma mchis so// drir dmigs pa ma mchis so// rer dmigs pa ma
mchis so// reg tu dmags pa ma mchis so// chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa la
mchis so/ sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchisaso// lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//
yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// migagi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus
te reg par dmigs su ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg par damagis pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmag
ba ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa mamachis so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs ba ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las khyud ba'itshir bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor par dge sa pa ma na ches/
go yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// chu'i khams sudamigs pa ma
[7 ]mchis so/ me'i khams su dmigs pa mamachis so// rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis se// rnam par shes pa'i kham
lhasu dmigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugs su
dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dgags pa mamachis
so len par dmigs pan mchis so// srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmigs pa mamachasaso// rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pam mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// nad stong ba nyid
phal ni/ du dmigs pa ma mchis so// bu stong ba nyid du dmigs ba ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid du dmags pa ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// theg ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dor bamed
pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa mamachis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du
dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 'di du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// yang dag par
spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrulakyi nang pa rnams su dmagos pa ma mchis so// dbang bo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su dmigs/
dpa ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags//
[On ]ba'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
tsa 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa mkhachis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so//
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// teng de
'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa
rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so// sas rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams
su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur
ba bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i
tshul du nyi bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang/ gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang/ gang du dmigs par bgyi bde
lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
des/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por sbyod pas/ des khyang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyichos
lta'ang ci smos/ brgya yinakyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi/ de ma
lags kha'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyang laM
dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims ngan nga 'ang mi dmigs so// bzod pa'ang ma dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma dmigs/ gnod sems kya
mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ le'apho'ang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan
pang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so// shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka 'on
kye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ tshor ba'i dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'du shes ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'du khyed la dmigs pa'i tshul dang/
rnam par shes ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ snami dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ lce mi dmigasapa'i tshul dang/
lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ gzugs ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rami

[4 ]dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sna'i rnam pa//
shes ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/
mig gi 'dus te reg kha la dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg ba ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs
pa'i tshul dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i
tshul dang/ rnapa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mdamigs pa'i tshul dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigasapa'i
tshul dang/ sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ me'i khams mi dmigs ba'i tshul dang/ rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang// /
nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'du khyad mi
[t ]dmigs pa'i tshul dang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ skye mched drugami dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ reg ba ma dmigs
snapa'i tshul dang/ tshor ba mi dmigs ba'i tshul dang/ srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ skye ba mi
dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang//
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ brtson 'grus kyis rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs
pa'i tshul dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ chen po steng pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ don dam pa stong ba nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'dus
byas stod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ thog ma dang tham med
ba stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ don bad ba stong pa nyid ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmig
ba'i tshul dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
tshul dang/ ngob nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmags pa'i tshul dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
tshul dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rdzu 'phrulakyi rkang pa bzhi ma dmags pa'i tshul dang/ dbang po lta mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ stobs ldami
dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'dzags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ bsam gtan bzhi'i dmogs pa'i tshul dang/ tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
tshul dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyud mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshe dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rnam par thar
[I ]pa'i sgo stong pa nyidadang/ mtshanamamed pa dang/ smon ba med ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang mngon par shes ba lha mi dmigasakha'i tshul dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs
pa'i tshul dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi gi dmigs pa'i tshul/
dang/ soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma dmags pa'i tshul dang/ snying rje chen po ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi ngamigs pa'i tshul
zla dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi mgas pa'i tshul dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshulaM
dang dgra bcom pa nyidam dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ ring byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dba' sems dab ba chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
ma tu phyin ba longs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro'ago/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba lasngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyini ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ban khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen bo ches la rnam par lta ba'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna
tshegs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang/ de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du
rgyu/ na gribam zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad de/ ko'u shi de bzhin du b.rol tu phyin pa lta shes rab kyi sa 'og tu byin bas yongs su zinakhas/ thams cad mkhyen
ka kha'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram bye brag mi rigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol kha/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon
tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin paniyon tanatshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad
@#ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bani yon tanamu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yasab dang ldan pa'o//
ts+tshA bcom ldan 'das rigasakyikhu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te khacas pa dang/ me tog dang/ 'breng ba dang/
spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud
du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi khu che la
thams las shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsalan/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa ! ko'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod nyid kyis ji ltar 'byed pa de ltar lung ston cig/ kolusha ka de dza sam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang/
sil snyanasna tshogs kyi rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
khungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la khyon te/ bgo bshar byas pa dang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bumo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs
me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang 3 spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyomadang/ nabaza' dang gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis ram gror
byas/ bkur stir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas n )de dag las gang ga khasod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gas/
bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhaneg shegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang//
[m ]'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na khaza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan snutshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ba zur stir bgyis//
sgyuphudud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyi sa babs/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yus kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsalan/ 'din de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/
rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi risan de bzhinagashegs ba'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i semasacan mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gsheg
pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang las chung dun de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam la/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyisan/
de dag thams cad kyang dag ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma lhug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shaka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
te ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/
phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bstan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir bus/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas
ba bas gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la khyen na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar
'gyur ro// ka' yika gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'a/ rigs kyi khumo la las shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste bshad cing bstan pa dang/
brjod ci bkrol ba dang/ rnam par phye sta gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel tu/
de ni ston pa yin par bsamamo// blama'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shika 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ga ldan zhes byas ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston ra/ ston pa nyid kyang
shesarab kyi ba lo'o tu phyin go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyakha rel tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnamasakyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med do//
de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//
lce 'thobabe// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par
'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing
rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyurare// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza' dang/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang/ bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang/ phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang/
mchod par khyabar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ nabaza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang bdan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phudud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko'u shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste//
@#/ khrunamed ba yang dag khar rdzogs pa'i khung chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di snyam ste gang zhig la bdag gis 'gro dang/ bkur sti dad/ budad dang/
mchod par byas te brtenatsi rnam par spyod par bya snyaman/ ko'u shaka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas
ba'i skye dgu dang/ mi dang lha dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yinen
bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang bo gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byas te brtan cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du
bsams so/ ko'u shika chos de'ang gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar da nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gro khyed/
bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchodabar byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phurud dang/ mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ kazhugaka ragasakyi bu ma/
rigasakyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shesarab kyilal tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang ) 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/
ba khyug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya ba dang/
mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang/ sil snyan/
snatshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya ba dang/ mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pharal tu phyin pa las khyung banA/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung bani de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u ka de lta pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i thag
ba pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi khu chosashesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyinyid la/
ba @#// ma tog dang/ 'phreng kha dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna
tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur ster khya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi khumo dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs kha'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa/
nyid theb bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha 'ogatu
phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gsum mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/
