rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyuran ke'u shikade ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsolakha/ bcom ldan 'das mngago/ bde bar gshegs ba mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/
kozung shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam klog pa 'am/ brel 'ag/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'dilas zag kha med pa'i chos gangal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi khu'o slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang/
'jug pa dang/ 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang/ 'thob pa dang/ thob par 'gyur ba dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
gyur pa dang/ 'thob kha dang/ 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang 'thab pa dang/ thob par 'gyur ba dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
gyur pa dang/ 'thob pa dang/ thob par 'gyur ba dang/ rang sas rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang/ 'theb pa dang/ thob par 'gyur pa
dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ 'jug par 'gyur pa dang/

bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'itshes
mang bo rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka khrag bamed pa'i ches rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi//
ka pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chan po steng pa de dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus
byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/
rang bzhin steng pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i de be 'di stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par song ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/
dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang
'a tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par thar/
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ) mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzus kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcudang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po
dang snying rje chen bo dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ 'di dag ni drag ba med pa'i chos te/ de dag nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher
bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyadachub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon
bar rdzogs par 'tsha rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shika sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag na rigs kyi khu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches tshad du 'phel kyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no// deci'i phyir zhen/
thu// ko'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten nas
yongs su grol ba ma yin ne// ke'u ni ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can 'dul ba dang/ la seng gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
zla nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ ko'u shika gad la las 'dzam
ltabu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bkod pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'bakod pa dang/ dag
bcom pa nyid la bkod pa las/ 'a ba zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la gzhagan/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
pha la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa las/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa ya nga dag par
rdzogs pa'ikhyang chub la gzhag/na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir na/ sems can ga cig pu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de na
na00 sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcod pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi kakhyang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/
phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rangasas rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka khyad chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni dbazhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams so// ke'u nika rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te ) 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/
tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/ ko'u shi ka rabis kyi bu 'am//
rigs kyi bu me la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkodabar gyuran/ ko'u ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'khol lam brgya ban gyis gsolal/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa ke'ushika de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyig
gzhan la khyenan/ bsod nams ches mang du 'khel la// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las khrag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
shing rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag nga 'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu theb par gyur to// 'thob/
ba theb dang ra 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te// 'theb khe// theb par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdeb par gyur te// 'thob bo// thob
par 'gyur ro// dag bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob te/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob
ge theg par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par shugs par gyur to/'dug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ ko'u shAka thag pa med pa'i chos/
de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ ! sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ! nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
chan po steng pa nyid dang/ don dam ba stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang ) rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ tshes thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi/
dang dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/
tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnamapar thar pa'i sgo/
sa bya@#// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanamamed pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon pa ra shes pa drug dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ se se yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje/
chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyitshes tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u 9/ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nga shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te klog pa dang/ bri ba dang/ kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la khyen na/ de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel/
bar shes pa pabu'o// da pa'i phyir zhan/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
ba bram ze'i rigs chu zheng mdzeb rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod de// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod de//
mtshama'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod de// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
[n} ]tshangs lha nyeban gyi lha rnams yod do: tshas pa kun ' khor gyi lha rnams yod de/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod de// snang ba'i lha rnams yod de// chung snang gi lha rnams yod de// tshad/
mad snang ba'i lha rnams yod de/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod de// dge ba'i lha rnams yod de/ chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha
rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod de// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod de// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod de// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og minagyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnams yod de/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams
yod do sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rel tu phyin pa yod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan
gyi la rel tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//

rang gi mtshan nyid stongaparnyed yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i deb nyid stong pa nyid yod/
de ngan pa che bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par song ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrulagyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do//

yodo gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i goms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng
ngas nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ snon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod de// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gsheg
[2/]pa'i stobs rnams yod de// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod de// snying rje chen po yod de// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du/
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa/
shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod de// dgra bcom
pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gra shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams yod do/ 3ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi ko'u shakagling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu
ma rigs kyikhu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'am la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u sha ka de jisnyams du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
'phel lam gsol pa// btsam ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo/ kha com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'angs ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi
khug gang gis shes rab kyi pharel tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klog pa dang/ brib dang 3 kha ton bu ba'i phyir gzhan la byinan bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyonamed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur re// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i tshes de dag kyang
gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang//

yod de nam mkha'amatha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skyemached kyi lha rnams yod de// cung zad med pa'i skye mchedakyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes
med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson
'grus kyi pa rol tu phyin pa yod de// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// nang stong pa 'di yod do// phyi stong nga nyid yod de// phyi nang stengang
nyid yod de// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod de/ chen po steng ba nyid yod de// don dam pa stong ba nyid yod de// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas
[Om ]stodapa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// der ba med pa stong pa nyid yod de// rang bzhin steng pa nyid yod de// ches
thams cad stong pa nyid yod de// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod de// dpes
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa tid yod de// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par slong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang bo rnams yod de//
a: stobs rnams yod de// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod de// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod de// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do/
tshad med pa rnams yodade// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod de// rnam
par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod de// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod de//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod de// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
yod do rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod de// rang byang chub yod do//
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod de// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod de//
dag bcom pa rnams yod de// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams yod de// ke'u shi kagazhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi ji snyad pa de dag rigs kyi lam/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa
bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod// ko'u ka ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ ka' stsal ba/ ko'u shaka de bas kyang rigs kyi khu
bas rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi rol tu phyin ba 'di'i glegs bam klog ba dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la khyenan bsod nams ches mang du 'bab//
la/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las khrag pamed ba'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo dgayang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te// 'a thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig
phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyiras 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par/
gyur te 'theb bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byung chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyonamed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
so mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyakhar 'gyur ro// ko shika zag pa med pa'i tshes de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rolatu[I]

med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jig pa bzhi dang/ soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang//

da tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod de// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod de// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod
do/ dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dag pa'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// tsha ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i

rnams yod do// rgyanem snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod de// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi/
lha rnams yod de// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// tshul khrims

yod do dor ba med pa stong pa nyade yod do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa/
nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod de// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod de/ yang dag
bar slong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam mam
lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod de/ bsam gtan rnams yodado// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod de//
[j]rnam par thar ba brgyad yod de/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yod do/
mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod de// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/
so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu yod do// phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid yod de// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod de// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong b rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod/
de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnams yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shika
shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma snyad kyi sems can ji snyad pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang//
0 @#// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mad du 'phel las/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasamang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u
ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klog pa dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la khyonan bsod
nams ches mang du 'phal lo// deci'i ri zhen/ ke'u shika de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chesa rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs

tsam thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/
'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong
pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong
ba nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thogam dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams
cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med
tsam @#// pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang//
stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis

gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhinagashegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad dang/

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod de// ko'u shAka nubaphyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi sems can ji snyed bde dag ragis kyi bu 'am/

bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam 3 gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar ga shegs

pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka de bas kyang ragis kyi bu lag/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam du bris shing klog kha dang/bri ba dang/

kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byinan bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher
pa/ bstan to/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am ) rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go/ 'jug khar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
bar gyur to// 'thobago/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te// 'thob bo/ theb par 'gyur ro// phyi ma'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te//
ba 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob 'go
thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur te// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// blun med pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu mngon par rdzogs khar sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ ko'u shika zag pa med pa'i ches de dag
kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong ba nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/
chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ theg ma dang tha ma med
pastengapanyid dang 3 der ba med pa stong ba nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid
dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang dnges po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'bags
ba'i bden pa bzhi dang (rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/
blo smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen
bo dbag ste ) sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med ba gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ ko'u shaka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ ribedas kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/
glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byinan/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/
ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltarangashes rab kyi pha rol tu byin ba 'di los chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram bre'i rigs che zhing mtheb
du rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyilha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ mtshema'i lha rnams yod do//
dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod de/ 'phul dka'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha te ban gyi lha rnams yod
do tshas pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod de// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod de// dge ba'i lha rnams yod de/ chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha
rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med tsa ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod de// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
shani tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod de// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// rnam shes mthal/
ngas sku mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yod do//

[n ]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong ba nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong ba nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do//

ma 'a sa ba ga pa pa nyid yod do// der ba ma da ba stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan 'di stong pa nyid yod do/
mi dbags ba stong pa nyid yod de// dngos bo med pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i de bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa ta bar gzhag pa rnams yod
zado yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod de/ dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad ba yod do// 'bags pa'i bden ba rnams yod do/ bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod de/
[o ]rnam par thar pa brgyud yod de// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yod de/ mngon/
par shes pa rnams yod de// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod de// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag
pa ra rig pa rnams yod do// sAng rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod de// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod de/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ !
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs
pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dag bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod de// byang chub sems dbal/
sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ ka' shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ dgis kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa bzhidang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkodan/ ko ka de jisnyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasamang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shaka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs

la sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cherab stan to/ ko'u shig rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klogs bam du bris
wA shing ga ba dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byinan/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ ded yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams khod do// khyim bdag
gi rigs che zhing maTha ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod de/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ (mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod de//
'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod de/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod de/ tshangs lhate phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
yod do tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod de// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dag pa'i
lha rnams yod do// chung dger lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod de// chung tsho'i lha rnams yod do// tshad
med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung pa lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod de/ spyanom snang
ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skyo
mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba yod do// nang
stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod de// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong ba nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam ba stong ba nyid yod do//
'dus byas stong ba nyid yod do/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ba nyid yod dodog dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
bod de rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong ba nyid yod do/ rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyidi yod de// mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong ba/
nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ri bi te de stong ba nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang ba rnams yod do// dbang bo rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do/ khyang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i
bden ba rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med ba rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar
[a ]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//
ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod de// ma 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med
do snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa
rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yo da do/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka shar lho'i phyogs
mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
ka bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol la ! bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs ba mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ka'u ni ka de bas kyang rigs
kyi bu bas/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la khyanan/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
la de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltarang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lasazag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya che bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi khu
mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'theb khe// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig
phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
gyur to 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bo rnams kyang khung chub sems pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka brag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pa rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/

nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad/

stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i pad ma bden pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par
[u]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhinagashegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ dga'

'tshe chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dag ste// sangs rgyas kyi tshes tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan 'byinan/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mdadu 'phel bar shes par bya'o//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs
che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod de// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i/
lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod de// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod de// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha//
rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
de kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod de// tshad med dag pa'i lha rnams yod do// dag rgyus kyi lha rnams yod de// che ba'i lha rnams
yod de chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shinatum gleng
ba'i lha rnams yod de// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod de// nam mkha' mthar yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sang shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
rnams yod de// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bgrod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod
'a/ spya// do nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyinang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam ba stong pa
nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod de// thegam da nga tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod de// der ba med pa stong
ba nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod de// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod de// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod de// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid

yod do ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod de// dngos po med pa'i ngo po nyid stong pa nyid yod de// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par sbyong ba rnams yod de// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
yod de dbang po rnams yod de// stobs rnams yod de// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod de// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod de//
bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod de// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/
bod de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yod de/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod de// gzus kyi sgo rnams med
do de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod de// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod de// snying rje chen po yod de// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams /
yod de/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod de// rang byang chub yod de// lam
gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod de// dgra bcom pa
rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod
ko'u shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyedakyi sems can rnga snyad pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la//
bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus med du 'phel lam/ gsolal/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u shi ka
[a ]@#// de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam dugs shing klog pa dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// deci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de na 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan to/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs
kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur te/ 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob go/ thob par 'gyur ro/
dgra bcem pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis rang khyang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
N+NaM dba' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bya nga chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jugago/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bod bsil rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyidi stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ donadam pa stong pa nyid dang ! 'dus byas stong
ba nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyudi dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong ba nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/
chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyidi dang/ dngos po med ba stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i de de
nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par sdong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang bo lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun/
dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang//
rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med ba dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang//
@#/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sas rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ khyams/
pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u gi ka rnam grangs des kyang
b+hU rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byanan/ de bas 'di'i
bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u ra ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas
rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthob rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshoma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//
tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ tshas lha la phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod de// snang ba'i lha rnams yod de/
chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dag/
ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod de/ che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad mad che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod
de mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams
yod do nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du
shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyidi yod do// stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong
pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong ba nyid yod de// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod de// 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid yod do//
ba 'a las 'das pa stong ba nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod de// der khamed ba stong ba nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid yod do// chos thams cad
stong pa nyid yod do/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid do/ mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod de// de be nyid stong ba nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
nA stod la ri 'od do// a dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod de// dbang bo rnams yod do// stobs
rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad
med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod de// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par/
thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod de// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungasakyiso rnams yod do//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod de// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod de// snying rje chen po yod de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
yod de: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de// dgrakhacom pa nyid yod de// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod de// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod de// phyir ma 'ong ba rnams yod do//

[o]/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ babyed pa'i pharel tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rel tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha relatu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang chen po steng pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus
sa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ der ba med pa stong ba nyid dang/ rang
bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ gang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ngekhe nyid
stong ba nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po/
lnga dang stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyiyan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mar/
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ ting de'an
thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhidang ) so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bcol rgyud dang/ byams pa chen po dang ! snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ches tshad
med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te// ko'u shi karnam grangs des kyang 'gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshes thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthe ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho b rnams yod do// khyim
wi bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod de// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams

ka mngon par shes pa drug dang 3 ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang 3 byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen bo dang/ dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shika rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du
bris shing klog pa dang/ bri ba dang/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na ) de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phalakhar shes par bya'o// deci'i phyir zhe na 3 ko'u shAka de ni
'ad ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te: de dag yod pas rgyala'ags che zhing mthob rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de/
khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mgo ba rnams yod de// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod de// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ mtshema'i lha rnams yod de// dga' ldan
[o]]gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod de// tshas ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye ban gyi lha rnams yod do// tshas
pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs chen kyi lha rnams yod de// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod de/ tshad med snang ba lha rnams yod de// kun snang
dang ba'i lha rnams yod de// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams
yod de chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod de// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod de// nam mkha'amatha' yas skye mchedakyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod/
do tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de//
shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid yod de// phyi nang stong pa yod do// stong ba nyid stong ba nyid yod do// chen po/
stong pa nyid yod do// don dmal stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod de// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma
wA dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod de// dor ba med pa stong pa da yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bod
de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag/
shu pa rnams yod do// yang dag par stong pa rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod de// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
yod do 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtana rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma
med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes ba rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//
mi 'jigs pa rnams yod de// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod de// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod
de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de// dgrabcom pa nyidi yod do// rang byang chub yod de// lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid yod de// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyirami 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod de//
rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod/
she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya so gcig pa// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang la la shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la khyedan/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du
spru// 'phel 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa la bkod pas rim yin no// gling chen po bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sams can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam la bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// stong gi
'jig rten gyi khams kyisamasacan thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa bzhi dang ) mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang/
bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhidang/ mngon par shes pa lngalabakod pas ma yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ ]
0mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de la tshul bzhin du yid 'byed pa ni 'di yin te/ gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang klogapa dang ) tshul bzhin du yid la khyedapa'o// gnyis pa spyod pa'ang ma yin//
mi gnyis ba la spyod pa'ang ma yin ba'i zlos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ tshul bzhin du
yid la byed pa'o// gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub pa byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klogar
dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzan pa dang/ kun chub par
byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la stod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// tshul khrims kyi
rol tuphyin pa 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yodi la khyad pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
[# ]@#/// spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'a yin pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang klog pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la
[t]byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'a ngam yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos/ nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang//
tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yani/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i byes/ phyi stong ba nyid tshul bzhin du yod la byed pa'o// ga rdos la spyod pa 'ong
ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mo ga sa pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin
pa'i blos 3 stong ba nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la skyed pa'ang ma yin pa'i bas/ chen po stong pa nyid tshul
bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la sbyod pa'ang ma yin/ ma gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la khyed nga lo// gnyis la
spyod pa'ang ma yin/ miganyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'ikhres/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa lta spyod
pa'angs yin pa'i blos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis laspyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa 'aspyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i bas/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyud tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la skyed pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed
pa'o gnyis la sbyod pa'am yin/ miganyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin
mi gnyis pa spyod pa'ang sa yin pa'i bos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ miganyis pa la spyod pa'am yin pa'i tshes/ ches
thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la
byed pa'o// gnyis la sbyor ba'ang ma yin/ miganyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i byes/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid lakhyedapa 'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yinaM
mag rkyen la spyod pa'angs yin pa'i blos dnges po med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos//
debed stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid byed pa'o// gnyis ka spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang 5na pa'i blos dngos po med pa'i de ba nyid
stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la skyed pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//
wA gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa 'a spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa
la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i byes/
dbang po rnams tshulakhazhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yani/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis
la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ miganyis pa la spyod
ba'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ ma gnyis pa ltar spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i byis//
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ bsam gtan rnams tshul bzhin du yid la bar
pa'o gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ra yin/ ma gsang ba spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshad mad pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa
la spradang 'ang ma yin pa'i blon// gzugs med pa'i snyaras par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/
rnam par thar pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yin la byed pa'o// gas la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ ma gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag tshul
bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis skyod pa'ang ma yin mi gas pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med
pa tshu khazhin du nga la byang ba'o// ka'i sang nga la kha ra sa nga la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mngon par shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ gnyis
sto na wa la re ga pa 'a sngog pa ba pa 5 rAdzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin ma ga tes pa 'a spyod pa'ang ma
pa'i blos/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshul bzhin du yod la khyed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'angs yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ de bzhin gshegs
[O" ]pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis laspyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i byes/ mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/
gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la skyed pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi
gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa ta spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ sangs rgyas/
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ thams cad shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid
la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma
yin miganyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i khos/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa 'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi snga rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du ma rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par
ston cing/ de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byedan/ ke'u shi ka de la shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su lta ba ma yani/
gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ nor bar ma yin ) dbri bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/
kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ rnam par byang bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin/ gzung bar ma yin/ mi gzung bar ma yani/ len par ma
yin der bar ma yin/ gnas par ma yin/ mi gnas par ma yin/ yang dag par ma yin/ leg par ma yin/ ldan par ma yin/ mi ldan par ma yin//
'dre bar ma yin/ mi 'dre bar ma yin rkyen du ma yin rkyen med par ma yin/ tshes sum yin ) chos ma yin par ma yin/ de bzhin nyid du ma yan/
deng nyin da ma yin par ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am[！ ]rigs kyi bu mo gangashes rab kyi pha rol
phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston pa ru byed cing/ de'i don gtanal
khab par ston par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gis bzung ba 'am/ kun chub par byas pa 'am/ bcangs pa 'am/ bkugs pa 'am/ tshul bzhin
zlu du yid la byas pas ni ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing kun chub par byed
da'achang zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing/ de gzhan la'ang rgya char rjod cing ston ka 'chad cing 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar khyed la/ yang dag
bar ston par byed cing/ de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni shin tu mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/ dge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan/ ya gi dang ldan par bstan par bgyi ste/ ko'u shi ka
de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo 'a las/ shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med gra sa med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang/ phreng ba dang
spos dang byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
kyis rim gror byas pa dang/ bkur stir byas pa dang/ phu dud du byas pa dang/ mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher den dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang/ bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang/ yang dag par bstan
pa byas na/ rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te 'das pa dang/
ma khyen pa dang/ da lta byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu lag/ rigs
kyi bu mo la las/ lho phyogs gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/
khyug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba ngan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs dang/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim khrer byas pa dang/ bkur
stor byas pa dang/ phu dud du byas pa dang mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shika rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don/
dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grungs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang/ bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang/ yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am//
rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang/ mkhyen pa dang/ da ltar byung
ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa ngag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sa/ mon pa/
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am 3 rigs kyi bu mo la las/ nub phyogasakyi de bzhin gshegs pa/
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag 'a nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang/ 'phrengab dang/ sngos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ nakhaba' dang/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang/ sil snyanasna tshogs dang/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang/ bkur stir byas pa dang/ phu dud du byas
pa dang ma chod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ga dang ldan

bsod nams 'don ches mang du 'phel lo// daci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 8/ rigs kyi bu mo la las//

ka/ sos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs dang/ bde ba'i yo byad thams
